content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
OMG!! Tasted like my grandma's homemade kalguksoo!! My grandmother really loved kalguksoo and I wish I brought her to this place. She would have loved it! The chicken kalguksoo broth was so rich and they give you a whole chicken! Their bossam was the best ever!! I dream of this place!!
